nodes.text: Viic was a male Zabrak who held the rank of commander within a military force serving the Galactic Republic, during the Cold War between the Republic and the Sith Empire. For part of the war, Viic was stationed on the planet Alderaan where he worked in Pallista Spaceport as a vendor of starship upgrades. He had brown skin and green eyes and while at the spaceport he wore brown, red, and yellow robes along with red pants.
Viic first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011.
